page.shortlink: api objects context request getheader method

description.p: Get a header value as a string.

prototypes.prototype: dim result as C = Context.Request.GetHeader(HeaderName as C)

argument.name: HeaderName
argument.description: The name of the header to get the value.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns the value of the specified header as a string.

discussion.p: The *[xb:Context.Request.GetHeader()]* method returns the value for the specified header. If the header does not exist, *[xb:Context.Request.GetHeader()]* returns an empty string. There is no distinction between a header that does not exist, and a header that exists with an empty value.
